website_summaries.verdict: A great all-around reading light with plenty of features to keep you focused on the page.
pros: A durable little clip-on book light
Has a fairly bright LED bulb with a wide beam of light that's easy on the eyes
Sturdy and inexpensive, its gooseneck is also easily adjustable
cons: It's a little big for use with smaller books and e-readers

customer_reviews.title: Not brightness
customer_reviews.text: I bought this reading light, because I used the same one years ago (same brand but didn't buy it on amazon) and it was great, very bright and I loved to use it to read at night. But I think this one might have come with some kind of defect, because there is no brightness, clarity is way less than the one before, and it looks like it is dying... I have even tried two brand new different kinds of batteries but no luck. Unfortunately, when I went to use it for the first time it was too late to return. But again, I think it might be that it came with a defect.
customer_reviews.author: Blue Ocean

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose- price is right - but feels a bit cheap
customer_reviews.text: So, This does what I want it do. It takes batteries which is what I want because I don't need anything else I have to charge. I think we all have enough of those. It feels a bit cheaply made- like something somebody ordered in bulk from China -and never checked for quality. However, it was cheap and it works - so I give it 3 stars- The switch is not a button - its a slide. In the past those have broken. This is too knew- so I can't say yet- but again it feels cheap and I bet it will break within the year.
customer_reviews.author: SJPizMBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: LONG LIFE!
customer_reviews.text: These lights use a double A battery and last a really really long time! We have had ours for 6 months and my daughter uses it every night for at least an hour to read and we still haven't had to change the battery. The light puts off the perfect amount of light and the clip doesn't ruin the pages of a book. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Can't believe I didn't try them sooner! Absolutely 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought them thinking I'd give them as a gift, but the person already had one. So I clipped one to a shelf above my bed and use it as a reading light at night. What I love is how easy it is to twist and change the direction of the light, that lets me control the amount of light with almost no effort. Also easy to turn on and off, and doesn't bother the cats. The clip holds well, it hasn't fallen off once.
customer_reviews.author: K. Duke

customer_reviews.title: Bright and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Bright and lightweight. I can read while my family watches TV without any lighting issues. The clip is strong and sturdy while the adjustable neck is both strong and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: LaLa

customer_reviews.title: I guess you get what you pay for although it should’ve lasted longer than they did
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these at the same time. I’ve use the first one for just over 2 1/2 weeks and it was dead. I took the batteries out put them back in and it still didn’t work. These were fresh batteries out of the package so it wasn’t the batteries. Ironically I ordered one sometime ago and the same thing happened to it. I used it maybe a month and it went dead. Not real happy with it right now
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Starr

customer_reviews.title: Nice Light for Reading
customer_reviews.text: I bought this light to clip onto my music stand in order to better see the notes. Unfortunately, this light isn't nearly bright enough to illuminate the music sheets. It is bright enough to use as it is originally intended, which is to clip onto a book. I gave it to my wife who was having trouble seeing well enough to read and she loves it. I ended up buying a bigger and much brighter light for my stand so it was a win-win situation for the both of us.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Fritchman

customer_reviews.title: This could be a good thing so I don't want to leave a negative ...
customer_reviews.text: It's VERY bright!! This could be a good thing so I don't want to leave a negative review. I bought this so I could read in bed and not disturb my husband, but it lights up the whole room! I taped a little mesh fabric over the light and that helped a lot. If you need bright light, this is your product!! The clip is perfect for my books and my kindle. I even clip it to my bedside table when I read a paperbook and it stays on perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: HeyAliJayTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Crazy bright
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my nightly reading session while I lay in bed and my husband sleeps. The only issue is it’s more like having a very bright light on in the room, rather than a more passive book light like we are used to. This one is so bright it can wake him up.... while I won’t be returning it I will also not be using it to read at night, it’s basically going to be a a flashlight that hooks onto things for power outages etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kel Kel

customer_reviews.title: handy
customer_reviews.text: this clip on light can be placed on a towel rack for the bathroom so I don't have to plug in a nightlight or turn the light on for overnight bathroom visits... it is bright enough for the small bathroom ( since we don't have a window) and not too bright while still sleepy...I can use it next to my pc in the dark without having to turn on a floor lamp. and the price is great too...
customer_reviews.author: theresa b

customer_reviews.title: A great idea, that falls shorrt
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of this light. I really needed it for the proofreading work that I do. It's clipped onto a very small lap desk, reading standard size pages. Unfortunately, the cord is not long enough so you can't lift the light far enough away from the page to broadcast light over the entire page, so the top is too bright and the bottom of the page is too dark. I'm constantly fussing with it. Additionally, the LED light is far too blue-white and it actually hurts my eyes when bouncing off the page.
customer_reviews.author: ChefShellie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: I am a flight attendant I like to work the all-nighters. This is perfect on top of the beverage cart and the food cart going down the aisle. Also great for reading so I don't wake up the passengers with the cabin lighting. I use it in the galley on the all-nighter also. It's very bright I've also used it to help people find things they drop on the floor on the plane and they can't find it.
customer_reviews.author: juli

customer_reviews.title: Perfect choice for night shift nurses working in dim light.
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this little light! I'd definitely buy it again. What I love about this light is that it covers the entire page on my clipboard without having to reposition it to illuminate what I'm charting. I bought 2 more for the other nurses I work with and they're very satisfied with this light as well.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Highgate

customer_reviews.title: Bright Little Light
customer_reviews.text: This is a bright little light. The batteries make it a little heavy, so I don't know that it is convenient and light enough to clip to a book, but i clip mine to the headboard above me. It works well enough that way. I like that it is very adjustable. We bought this so that it wouldn't disturb the baby or each other if we ever had enough energy to read ever again. Sadly, it has only been used a couple of times, but those times have proven that this thing works. It is very bright, but that light doesn't travel too far to disturb anyone in the surrounding area. Let sleeping babies lie.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda P.

customer_reviews.title: Great value for its price
customer_reviews.text: Very bright. Would prefer to have different settings for brightness but otherwise love it. The adjustable arm is great and makes it easy to see things even at the very bottom of a page. Got it for a road trip and the driver said they didn’t even notice the light. It’s a little bulky due to the batteries but I prefer that over one with a short battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Jennel C.

customer_reviews.title: I like this little lamp
customer_reviews.text: Bought on impulse to see if it would illuminate a laptop so I don't have to turn on a whole lamp. It's great! I clipped it to the screen edge, bent the "arm" to focus the light on the keyboard, and am really happy with it. (Will edit later if anything goes awry. Have only used it for a couple of hours so far.)
customer_reviews.author: dk

customer_reviews.title: Way too bright. Your spouse will not be happy...
customer_reviews.text: Too bright!! This thing is not for reading in bed. I could better use it for a spotlight or to Marshall incoming airplanes.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter got one of these for her birthday from a family member, I ended up buying a different one for myself that seemed fancier but it was terrible so I ended up buying one of these for myself. I love it, super bright and easy to use. I have rechargeable batteries in both mine and my daughters so that we can just recharge and put back in.
customer_reviews.author: madison phillips

customer_reviews.title: Light not so very bright on a large page
customer_reviews.text: I have small led flashlights whose lights are much brighter than this Takes 3 aaa batteries. Light adequate for a small paperback. Expected it to be brighter based on most of the comments I read. Just got it so don’t know how batteries last but don’t expect that to be an issue. Overall, adequate, but not outstanding.
customer_reviews.author: Publius

customer_reviews.title: Best reading light I have ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many reading lights over the years but this is the best! All the others only lighted part of the page and required constant maneuvering to keep reading. The first one I bought was years ago. I have yet to replace the batteries. When I found them on amazon I bought several so I can keep one in each of my reading nooks and a spare just in case.
customer_reviews.author: Watson

customer_reviews.title: Works great, clips on very well
customer_reviews.text: I've been very pleased using this light on my son's bunkbed. We've had it for 3 months and haven't changed the batteries but we only use is for a short time every night. Compared to a different clip on light we have, this light clips easily and DOES NOT SLIDE OFF which we love!
customer_reviews.author: cb

customer_reviews.title: Bright light when it actually works
customer_reviews.text: Material does feel a bit cheap, though the light is bright with a nice range and it’s not super heavy on your book. My biggest problem with it is the light doesn’t work properly - not sure if it was damaged prior to delivery or my baby messed it up, but the light housing is loose and the on/off switch is not completely reliable - something in the wiring must be loose because it will turn on dimly but if you jiggle it/hold the light casing a certain way, then it will fully turn on. Very annoying - I will be purchasing a different light.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: Buy a dimable one if partner is in bed with you
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says it does. The neck easily adjusts and the clips stays put on my books. It’s very bright without being “blue”. However, it’s so bright that I can’t use it at night when my fiancé is in bed too. I wish I would’ve gotten a dimable one, but I’ll probably just keep it and read in bed at the times that I go to bed before he does.
customer_reviews.author: Dogs are expensive. Why do I have 3??

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I like this little guy. It’s very bright and easily maneuverable. My eyesight is not good in the dark and this is a great tool to have.
customer_reviews.author: jillian

customer_reviews.title: Such a handy thing to have
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for an extra light for my bedroom. We do not have enough outlets. After checking on Amazon for all kinds of lamps, I bought this one because I just could not wait anymore. It is so handy. I can clip it to my clothing when I am working on something that needs extra light. I have used it for reading bedtime stories and want my child to go to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bode

customer_reviews.title: Handy, clever little light
customer_reviews.text: Very useful little clip-on light. Produces BRIGHT light. I have one clipped to a bookcase near my bed so I can find DVDs and other items and a second one clipped to the back edge of a bathroom countertop to illuminate the toilet... makes taking a leak in the dark a lot more accurate, and without switching on the overly-bright-for-what-I'm-doing bathroom wired lights. Looks good, very flexible head, reasonably strong clamp -- the only thing I'd change is the switch, which has four raised dots on it. A push button might be easier to operate, as it is you slide the switch forward and backward on the head. Not a major complaint. Good price, looks good, works well.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon M. Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to attach to my stand backstage so that I could keep up with the script during a show. The clip is nice and tight. Didn't have any problems with it falling off. The light is bright but focused so that it didn't light up the backstage area too much. Perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: AJG

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: My old book light would blink every time I moved from the second I opened the package and it was way too bright. This one has never blinked on me. It’s also the perfect brightness for me to see my book while not annoying my fiancé. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Great for reading in bed!
customer_reviews.text: I recently got another book light that was awful, but this one is amazing. It projects the light, and it has a long flexible neck that you can put anywhere. It has a very sturdy and large clip that is perfect if you're using it with a tablet or laptop. I use this to read and color in bed! Believe it or not, it puts out enough light to color in bed!! You won't be disappointed if you buy this. Also, there are other more expensive ones, but why waste money. The only drawback is that it uses 3 AAA batteries. However, they do last quite a while.
customer_reviews.author: cloverab

customer_reviews.title: Great little light!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a "battery" operated light. This is very nice and it's bright. I had the one you charge and it did not work right. At least I know when this light gets dull, I can just put in new batteries. You can't beat the price either.
customer_reviews.author: Pinky1

customer_reviews.title: Finally, Enough Light To Read!
customer_reviews.text: Came exactly as stated. It's lightweight. The flexible arm stays put to whatever angle you have it at. The clip has a wide range and can hold fast to any hard surface. I had it clamped to a piece of tubing and it didn't budge. The LED is quite bright, and I hope it doesn't kill the batteries too quickly. I am quite happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony A. Payson

customer_reviews.title: So many uses, I can't list them all.  Perfect product
customer_reviews.text: Bought of these. Use them for all kinds of purposes. My favorite is over my keyboard in my office. I can work in a dark room and still see the keys when I need to. Husband uses his for paperwork while watching TV and for reading. Gave my aunt one that she uses for reading her Bible. Great for older people with fading eyesight.
customer_reviews.author: Stina

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great
customer_reviews.text: Good, but not great. Serviceable and lightweight. Would be better but the clip isn't very strong and it shifts a bit on my book if I move it too much. Update: The head where the lamp is fell off it's neck and it died. I lasted about 8 months, which for the 8 dollars I paid isn't bad I guess. Next time I'll purchase something more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Rory Reads

customer_reviews.title: Great book light, work light, everyday light!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 6 of them for Christmas 2017. Here it is October 2018 and they all are still working strong. Only replaced batteries in one of them after they dimmed a little and my son wanted some more light. Really did not need to replace them, but he wanted to. The others are all still very bright with daily use of reading, etc. They work great and I would buy them again when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: dinko1x

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: Great little light! I bought this for my son who likes to read before he goes to bed. It is very bright, which bothered me a bit at first but I appreciate it after buying other more expensive yet dimmer lights. The batteries also last longer than most book lights we've owned, which is a big plus. the clip is rather large and a bit bulky, but it is strong and is very secure to whatever you clip it to. This light also doubles as a flashlight for us when we cannot find one ;) Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: momoftwoboys

customer_reviews.title: Not the best book light I've owned
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two f these book lights and one is faulty; it flickers during use, and goes off when adjusting the angle. The good one works fine and I would give the product 4 stars. I've had better booklights for a similar price point.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product...I used it to read by...in my home recording studio and for anything else wherein a small light is needed. Good build quality and so far it's proved to be durable. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: CTSIA-100

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful little light. Very bright, the "snake" part of the light changes and hold position extremely well. Have had for 18 months (use it every night for 20 mins or so) and the light is going strong. My only complaint is that the clip part is a bit large; If I clip it snuggly to the top in my kindle, the clip covers a bit of the screen.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stockslager

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I keep coming back to get more of these as those around me see mine and want one. I've had mine for 2 yrs and replaced batteries once. I absolutely love them for my bible reading, books and anything else I need direct light on. You can't beat the price.
customer_reviews.author: Halonwngs

customer_reviews.title: I love this book light
customer_reviews.text: I love this book light! It is light weight: the clip works on paperbacks and magazines as well as a hefty book. The fully adjustable light allows you to read any size page and whether you are sitting upright or laying down in bed. The light is bright for healthy eyesight but can be positioned so as to not shine on your sleeping partner. I've tried at least a least a half dozen lights and this is the best of all. I just purchased a second one for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: D. R. Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: The light on this isn't very bright and it doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: The light on this isn't very bright and it doesn't hold onto a book very well. I don't think it was worth the money. I had the itty bitty book light years ago and it worked much better
customer_reviews.author: CUSTOMER

customer_reviews.title: Bright, white light!
customer_reviews.text: Great and very bright, perfect for reading! I’m able to flip this over a handful of pages and read at night without bothering anyone. Pleasantly surprised by the nice, bright white light!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great for Reading
customer_reviews.text: These lights are perfect for reading in bed. We've bought 5 over the last 7 years for our children. Once they learn how to read they get their own reading light. The clips fit perfectly on the kids' bunk beds.
customer_reviews.author: A. Boggess

customer_reviews.title: Great Light....
customer_reviews.text: 1. The neck is so flexible that you can bend it in any direction easily. 3. It clips onto a book, a tablet, or just about anything with a fairly thin base. 3. Batteries last a long time in it. ..really long time. 4. It becomes a mini flashlight when you travel. 5. The beam is a fairly thin point of light. My husband uses it to read a book when I'm asleep and the light doesn't bother me. 6. It sits of nicely on a table like a mini table light 7. Light weight.. I wish I had purchased it a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Pam A

customer_reviews.title: Breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: Normally I do not write reviews but I had purchased this book light in December and by January was giving me trouble. I am searching for a new one to replace it and this one keeps coming up as the best. Basically after a month, the only way it would light up is if I was applying serious pressure to the power switch while in the on position. Complete waste.
customer_reviews.author: Lauralee Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: I use it to read music notes in the dark ...
customer_reviews.text: I use it to read music notes in the dark when i am playing with my band. Its bright enough to see the writings clearly and it doesn't spread so doesn't light up the sounding area, which is what i wanted as we have laser lighting going on and didn't wanted to disrupt that...
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: It's a really good. Nice and bright in the exact position needed
customer_reviews.text: This our 3rd purchase of this same booklight. I bought a second one for my my daughter and then replaced mine that we left on vacation accidentally. It's a really good. Nice and bright in the exact position needed.
customer_reviews.author: Luv Mum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This clamps firm to book and stays in place. Light is perfect for reading. Stem adjusts to the area needing light. I would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dors

customer_reviews.title: A quality, affordable light
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this to use for my 2nd Generation Kindle, because the case I used had no light. The clip has a good grip, holding the light firmly in place, but did not create any undue pressure on the Kindle itself. The light is very bright, and provides nice even lighting across the page. The flexible neck holds its position nicely until adjusted.I have also used this on a number of printed books. Again, the clip holds the light in place without damaging the books in the slightest. It has come in handy for providing illumination to all kinds of situations all over the house. A great light at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: J. Grant

customer_reviews.title: Book lite doesn't cover the page!
customer_reviews.text: The lite is bright enough; doesn't flicker; stays in the chosen position. HOWEVER, the lite does NOT reach the top left or right corners of a 6" x 9" book, leaving those two sections of the printed pages in darkness. The top corners can be illuminated by raising the lite head up and away from the book, but this causes the lite to shine over the top of the book and shine into the room past the book, but then puts the bottom of the pages in darkness. This lite works best on smaller, paperback books, illuminating the entire pages.
customer_reviews.author: Kael

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for use with a Kindle
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased to use with a 6" Kindle (the original kind without a keyboard). The clip is kind of big for the Kindle, so it is a little wobbly. However, the fit is good enough considering that it was not explicitly designed for the Kindle. The light is diffused so it illuminates the entire display evenly. The flexible neck is stiff enough that it holds the light in place -- the light does not 'wander' while you are reading. Can't tell how long the battery life is -- haven't burned through the first set yet. It is at least 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Allen B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Great light for reading or writing in bed. Keeps your spouse from complaining which was my entire purpose in buying it. Very odd that I tried to buy 2 more today and the seller has a limit of one per customer. Their loss, I just bought 1 more instead of 2.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Gillette

customer_reviews.title: Very bright light.  Batteries last a long time.
customer_reviews.text: I got this light to use while I am reading in bed. My husband tends to fall asleep earlier than I do so I needed a small light to use instead of my bedside table lamp. I like this book light - but it is very bright. It works almost too well for what I need it for. The batteries last a long time though which is a bonus for such a bright light. I do like the brightness of this lamp when I am using it other times, but for the purpose I bought it for it would be nice if there was a 2-option setting - High and Lo.
customer_reviews.author: Busy Working Mom in California

customer_reviews.title: Needs to be Close Up for Strong Light
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a clip on lamp to put on my bedside bookshelf. This is alright but not as bright when it's a ways away from what you're looking at. This is useful for a dim sweeping light when I'm reading or online in bed before falling asleep, but in order to really light something you have to clip it on to the item itself. To be useful as a book light, it needs to be very close to the pages. It's not perfect for what I was looking for but it's good enough. An unexpected use I discovered: I clip it onto my lap-desk for more direct lighting when I paint my nails :)
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great handy little book light
customer_reviews.text: It works wonderfully for reading as I was tired for trying to fit my books under the light of a bedside lamp. I find this light also works on the computer table when I need to write something late at night. Being battery-powered, it will be a boon for undoubted future power outages, too, as trying to pass the time reading by 4-5 candles just wasn't cutting it. I'm very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: dus7

customer_reviews.title: Light doesn't spread.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the idea of this, however the light is that blue color that is super bright but doesn't spread out. I don't know how else to explain that, so about 1/3 of the page is super brightly lit up at a time and you have to move the light around.
customer_reviews.author: Travis & Marisa Tramp

customer_reviews.title: Portable, handy, adequate light
customer_reviews.text: It's not a floodlight, but for reading it does the job. Very versatile. Everything seems solid except the light switch, which feels like cheap plastic. Otherwise it's great for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: you gotta me kidding me
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely worthless product. I cannot understand how some people gave it 5 stars. It is dim; the neck doesn't hold itself in place--just all of a sudden droops; the clip has limited opening but is very bulky and heavy. It casts a wide light perimeter, which just makes the light terribly dim by scattering what small amount of light it projects. It is not even as bright as the average plug-in night light. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: life is fun

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I have had book lights that have either not worked well to start with or they fall apart within a few weeks. This Task & Book Light has a large clip that securely holds the book, it is very light, the goose neck bends to whatever angle you need and the light itself is able to shine down on both pages of the book making it very comfortable to read. I have to get another one because my husband now wants one. This is a great product,
customer_reviews.author: Addicted Reader

customer_reviews.title: Light is bright
customer_reviews.text: The light is perfect and the neck is flexible which is a plus. The reason I didn't give it higher stars is because the base is so heavy it bends my pages of the book.
customer_reviews.author: cchamp

customer_reviews.title: My kid loves this light for reading
customer_reviews.text: My youngster, unlike her father, loves to read. I bought this light to use in the car while traveling where she just reads and reads nonstop. It clips tight on the book and lights up her pages perfectly. It is so much better than driving with the dome light on which was really distracting for me. We liked it so much we bought one for our other car also. I really like this light, great product.
customer_reviews.author: FG

customer_reviews.title: Very bright,
customer_reviews.text: Love this for reading at night. My hubby goes to bed before me, and this enables me to still be beside him but not disturbing him. It's pretty bright, so I still angle it away from him. Batteries don't seem to last too long- maybe I need better quality batteries, but the function and flexibility of the cord are awesome! Also, the clip has a soft foam on the inside so you don't damage your pages in any way.
customer_reviews.author: family of 6

customer_reviews.title: 4 star
customer_reviews.text: Hey, I like this! It works well and has a long battery life. Fell asleep with it on one night and fully expected if to be burned out soon. Nope! Easily clips on to almost anything!
customer_reviews.author: Kendashade

customer_reviews.title: Handy items; works as described; price is definitely right
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cool little light. I wanted something to use when reading at night on the patio or in bed. This does the trick. It doesn't get hot and it casts a bright light. It's flexible so you can aim it where you want and not very heavy. I tried using it with a magazine; that's is asking too much of this item because it has to clip on something solid or several sturdy pages. But it's workable with magazines if that's important.
customer_reviews.author: Clutter Hater

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great
customer_reviews.text: My kids LOVE these. We have them clipped on a little shelf on their wall by their bed to use for a reading light before bed or in the morning when it's too early to get up. They LOVE them.
customer_reviews.author: ADJ

customer_reviews.title: It nearly caught Fire!!
customer_reviews.text: I put batteries in this item. Within minutes, the unit was hot to the touch. Opened the battery compartment, batteries were installed correctly but they were so hot I couldn't touch them. Had to shake them out of the unit and carry them outside with an oven mitt.
customer_reviews.author: Lela Waggoner

customer_reviews.title: What a handy little device!
customer_reviews.text: I honestly don't remember how I got this; I think it may have been thrown in free with a larger purchase. The little booger has been EXTREMELY handy, though. It's even better than a flashlight for working in tight spaces, such as hooking or unhooking cables and cords from the backs of computers or DVD players or just stumbling to the bathroom at 4 a.m. without blinding oneself with overhead lights. Of course it's designed for reading and it's excellent for that, too! I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Evans

customer_reviews.title: Just What You Need for the Blizzard of 2013
customer_reviews.text: Bought this light to use for reading in bed at night. Boy, was I glad I had it when the lights went out during the blizzard in the Northeast. Much better than a traditional flashlight. Just clip it on to something and adjust the direction of the light, and you can light up an entire room. It won't be super-bright, and it's a very cool light, but you can see. And you won't have to light candles, which risks a fire. The batteries seem to last a long time. I might buy a few more before the hurricane season later this year.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Not bright enough to read medium hardback book.
customer_reviews.text: Based on other reviews I expected this to be a bright light with a broad beam. It isn't. I wonder if I have a defective one. There's only one LED bulb and when I try to read at night, I have to keep moving it very close to parts of the page as I move down. It's easier to hold a flashlight. I'm very disappointed, but I destroyed the packaging and it would cost too much to return, so I've repurposed it as a keyboard light for the laptop. It gives just enough light to see where the keys are, but not enough to read them on the opposite end.
customer_reviews.author: gadget gal

customer_reviews.title: much better then nothing
customer_reviews.text: This is a good book light .. not a great book light... not as bright as I like, hard to get an angle that stays put. batteries last a very long time.. There are better ones if you don't want to bother to have the very best this one is good enough.
customer_reviews.author: Justjon

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly for my laptop
customer_reviews.text: I needed a little lamp fir my new laptop which does not have a lighted keyboard. I used one of these on my first Kindle,then when I purchased my Kindle Fire,I no longer needed it.But I couldn't find it so here I am again,extolling the praises of this little powerhouse. It lights up my keyboard perfectly so I do not have to turn any lights on when I am playing WoW. The packaging was the typical clam shell,which I detest,but I managed to open it and still have 10 fingers. All-in-all,you can't go wrong with this cute little thing.
customer_reviews.author: ellafan

customer_reviews.title: Best Book Light EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best book light I've ever used.....and I've used a lot. The battery actually lasts on this for such a looooong time! It's super bright and has a good "shine-range." Other book lights want to start dimming on you after about 30 min. and wind up being a one-time 30 min. use light---total junk, but this is actually a real-life-legit-working book like! I love the bendable neck, I can actually clip this to the post on my day bed and bend the light to where I need it. Yes, the clip is a little bulky but it's no big deal when you see that this thing actually works, and works great!
customer_reviews.author: MisMiss

customer_reviews.title: Really useful
customer_reviews.text: The LED light is lightweight, the head is flexible, and the light is brilliant. It takes three triple A batteries (which are not included) and the clip is really nifty. The light covers an area that fits a full marble notebook (open to two pages). It's really handy for doing late night work, when you don't want to disturb your roommate, or bed mate. For college, it was recommended that I bring a desk lamp, but I think this little light provides sufficient lighting for a desk lamp, without taking up much space. I don't think I'll need a desk lamp, after all.
customer_reviews.author: Nasrin

customer_reviews.title: Super bright but a great light
customer_reviews.text: This light is very good for the price. The size is smaller than I expected, even with the battery usage. The light is EXTREMELY bright... but I read a couple other reviews stating that they used some tape to cover it a couple times to dim it down a bit. You literally could use this a flashlight in a dark tunnel, so unless you are reading by yourself, do not expect to use this light with your significant other sleeping next to you.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Z.

customer_reviews.title: at last
customer_reviews.text: Wow, after half a dozen different lights for reading I have found one that so far has been perfect. Its bright, easy to move or pivot into a shape that hits the book without glare. In a room that is dark and this light being the only thing lighting the book it is perfect. The clip is strong and holds the lamp in place but isn't hard to use. I have limited use of my hands and have very little strength but have no problems working the clip. Only negative and its minor is that it takes 3 aaa batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Beoceol

customer_reviews.title: not bright enough generic product
customer_reviews.text: Ok, i didn't like this when i got it delivered because the light was not bright enough it is very dim it will make your eyes bad when you read with this. And just now I went to Fred Meyer and found out the exact made in china product that is selling $9.99. So yes, this is a generic brand made by whoknows in China and Falcrum just put their name on the package. Very disaapointed!
customer_reviews.author: Adani Chiamatto

customer_reviews.title: Great simple little light
customer_reviews.text: To echo others, great little LED light, especially the bang for your buck part. The LED light has a plastic convex lens on it making the light fan out in a circular pattern. Clip works good on a lot of different surfaces, has a little rubber pad to grip onto things, opens a max of 1.5 inches maybe. The light neck bends to whatever I please and stays in place. 3 AAA batteries are needed and not included. Can't say how long the batteries last, but so far has gone 2 book worth. Everything is plastic except for the neck (which is some sort of metal) as far as I can tell.
customer_reviews.author: Squirrelisan

customer_reviews.title: A great little light
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little light. It uses 3 AAA batteries, which last a long time. The neck is very flexible. The light is a bit on the bright side, so I find I need to keep adjusting the neck to keep the light from being too bright and waking up my husband. With a hardback, it stays just fine. With a paperback, I have to use the back cover and a number of the pages to keep the light clipped on. Overall, it functions well and I'd recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: nomer15

customer_reviews.title: Great little light
customer_reviews.text: Best small reading light I've had. I find the button battery styles go dead more quickly and they are more expensive than the AAA sized batteries this takes, and the light lasts much longer with the LED used in it. It's base is slightly bigger (not much) and a little heavier but not too much, than button style battery models, but that's fine for how much less the batteries cost and the length of time the light lasts on the 3 AAA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Uncleknubs

customer_reviews.title: Great, durable mini clip light
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these over a year ago for each of my older children. They have been used all over the house, and not just for the calm, quiet bedtime reading they were intended for. The battery(ies) last a loooooong time. They have been left on all day, stepped on, and little brother does who knows what with them, and they are indestructible. Goose neck is very flexible and stays in place. The light is bright enough to light a book, but not too bright. This has been a happy purchase with no regrets!
customer_reviews.author: K-Lo

customer_reviews.title: Battery pack very hot
customer_reviews.text: This was very scary hey.. My husband put the AAA batteries in we're sitting there on the sofa I looked at it picked it up it was so hot the battery pack he it... Picked it up by the light bulb stem put in seeking out the batteries out it was extremely hot it could have caused a fire if left please do research into this before someone gets hurt what starts a fire
customer_reviews.author: Kandie Bean

customer_reviews.title: Ideal
customer_reviews.text: After looking at many reading light options, decided on this one based on the reviews. Very happy with my choice. It's not as heavy or cumbersome as I feared since it uses conventional batteries. Stays secured when clipped to a book, even small paperbacks. The light is bright enough for easy reading without being obnoxious. Easy to turn on and off and the goose-neck flexibility is easy to adjust and stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Mike F

customer_reviews.title: It's ok, but if you're buying for Kindle, buy an M-Lite
customer_reviews.text: I have a book light by M-Lite company for my Kindle, which I really like. However, due to the way this light is engineered, I needed a second light for regular books. The light from this fulcrum light is harsh, but usually adequate. Sometimes it doesn't cover the entire page, so part of it is in shadow. It is a bit heavy, but workable. I am worried that it will start to "blink" as it ages, as some customers have complained about but so far--so good. I wish I had ordered the "Mighty Bright" instead and will do that next time, as this appears cheaply engineered.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen P. Stucker

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t have much expectations with deal I got but was pleasantly surprised at compact nature but brightness - should work well in dorm room without being obtrusive.
customer_reviews.author: Shopfrvirginia

customer_reviews.title: Perfect light
customer_reviews.text: I love this light! It’s so perfect having on my nightstand while in bed. It sits perfectly flat and the neck is completely flexible for wherever you need the light. Excellent buy.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B

customer_reviews.title: Decent Mini Light
customer_reviews.text: Good mini light, good clamp, LOUSY on-off switch! I like the thing but do these companies TRY their products before selling? The on-off switch is just a thin, cheap slider with a couple low, smooth ridges that are very hard to get a good grip of to click, so you have to bear down firm and try several times to work it which only makes it harder to slide! Will have to MODIFY the switch to IMPROVE it so that it works easier before something breaks.
customer_reviews.author: The REAL Deal

customer_reviews.title: Great night reading light
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful little light, lightweight and sturdy clip. Took one star off because I thought it was rechargeable
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Light illuminates whole page
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these and the first one I received did not work. I notified Amazon, used thier preprinted return label, and got a replacement within about 3 days :-) The second one works just fine. It got it for my daughter who is in college so she can stay up late without bothering her roomie. I tried it out and it is a very good light: bright, not glary, and the light is broad enough to light up both sides of the page so you don't have to move it back and forth, up and down. It would work easily on a book as big as a text book. I ordered one for myself today.
customer_reviews.author: Bijouandbucky

customer_reviews.title: Good book light
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy little light that fits easily onto a hardback book. Will work on a paper back but the clip is just a little heavy and can make it awkward but still very doable. The light is very bright--almost too bright if you wake up in the middle of the night to read. Takes a few minutes for my eyes to adjust. I've had mine for about a year and is working fine. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: KatMatt

customer_reviews.title: Clip's tight, light's bright
customer_reviews.text: Clip is sturdy and stays In place while the light is bright. Will update on battery life but so far so good
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Too bright for me
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this with the intention of using it to read next to my partner while he sleeps but it's much too bright. It works almost as a flashlight and brightens the entire room. I painted over the light part with red nail polish and that helped make it more dim while still allowing me to read in the dark with it.
customer_reviews.author: RCTID

customer_reviews.title: I don't like to use it in bed at night because I ...
customer_reviews.text: It's OK. The light is SO bright, I don't like to use it in bed at night because I don't want to keep my husband awake! I would have returned it if I didn't feel like it would have been too much of a hassle!
customer_reviews.author: ELMA16Top Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Loses brightness
customer_reviews.text: The light starts out bright, but starts fading as time goes on. About 15 minutes into my reading I can't see the words at the bottom of the pages.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Crawford

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Bright
customer_reviews.text: Strong clip. Flexible neck. Very, very bright light! Thankfully, it was cleverly designed with a "lip" preventing any light spilling into your eyes. I couldn't believe the difference when I turned it on. I said to myself: "How could I have reading without this thing?" It runs on 3 AAA batteries, and can clip very large amounts (or small) pages to hang on to the book. The flexible neck allows you to minutely adjust it to just about any angle without falling over - that is, it'll stay in place while you read, and yet will freely move without much effort. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Master Jedi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in the dark!
customer_reviews.text: If you are in a dark place or in bed with someone who is sleeping this little light works great. Clips on to your book or pad and doesn't shadow.
customer_reviews.author: Bronte1068

customer_reviews.title: Very handy light.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little light. The flood lens is really great for lighting up music on a music stand, or a laptop keyboard. It stands on it's own quite sturdy due to the weight of the batteries but also clips on very well with tension that is just right for it's weight. Regular batteries last a good long time since it is a LED but it's worth using rechargeable batteries.
customer_reviews.author: L Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great little light for many uses!
customer_reviews.text: This little lights are great for task lighting! We use one by the phone for messages and reading the phone book and I have two in the shop for my older power tools (radial arm, router table, etc.) that don't have laser guides or built-in LEDs like many newer power tools and tables. Battery powered so no built-in lithium batteries to limit it's lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Neutrino

customer_reviews.title: Versatile!!  I love these LED clip lights.
customer_reviews.text: Great! They are prefect for clipping onto by nail polish caddy so that I can see to paint my nails while I watch TV. I don't have to have a traditional lamp blasting on me, reflecting off the screen and irritating my husband . Kids use it on their books and to find things that get lost under the couch.
customer_reviews.author: E. Drouin

customer_reviews.title: Useful
customer_reviews.text: Used it on my laptop and tablet with keyboard. Worked well and convenient size
customer_reviews.author: leakhanas srey

customer_reviews.title: Not the greatest for Kindle
customer_reviews.text: Book light reviews are always subjective, so I had a real hard time choosing a new one and finally settled on this for my new Kindle. With the batteries in it and the way the clamp is made, it doesn't clip onto the "naked" Kindle anywhere. It will keep falling off unless you hold onto it with your hand. I've resisted buying a cover because of the added weight (I mean, the Kindle is supposed to be lightweight, right? That's its big selling point), but it looks like I'm going to have to cave in so I have something to clip this light to.
customer_reviews.author: JJS

product_meta.title: Light It! By Fulcrum, LED Book Reading Light, Clip On, Silver
product_meta.description: This product provides hands-free lighting for a variety of uses. Its clamp not only fixes it to books and boards, but also functions as a stand, making it a compact and maneuverable lighting solution for tasks involving fine manipulation and examination.
feature_bullets: All Purpose Lighting – More than just a book light, the multi-flex clip on light makes an excellent task light for reading, typing, crafting, travel and more
Ultra-Bright LED Light – Floodlight technology provides ultra-bright, glare-free, wide beam lighting you never have to replace
Hands-Free Lighting Solution – Strong clamp light provides direct, bright light for tasks such as working on car or in tight spaces where you need focused light and free hands
Flexible Neck – Durable and fully flexible gooseneck allows light to be directed anywhere for ease of use

specifications.Included Components: Security & Safety, Tactical Flashlight, Personal Protective Equipment
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars2,307 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
